On top of that, its a great party game for a group of friends. Especially if you're introducing them to the game and know how to really make this game scary to them. ;>

Aun no llevo las horas jugadas que quisiera pero me son suficientes para hacer una reseña. El juego la verdad que me encanta, puede parecer muy simple o repetitivo, pero con amigos la verdad que es una experiencia muy divertida como "aterradora" jaja. Hay dias que cuando juego como asesino tarda como 15 min en encontrar partida como hay dias que tarda 2 min. Para encontrar partida como superviviente es bastante rapido por suerte, me gusta la variedad que hay en cuanto a las habilidades de cada asesino y superviviente. No es un juego que este muerto para nada y mucho menos que este muriendo, si siguen haciendo las cosas bien, el juego tiene para rato, por lo que lo recomiendo.

I have very mixed feelings about this game. I love it and I hate it. This game is incredibly fun as both roles, survivor or killer. The problem is this can all depend on the people in your game. I have spent about half of my time on killer and survivor and I still don't know which role I like more. Survivor is fun if you get good teammates (if you are playing with randoms). What I like to do is play with friends making it a lot more fun because you all want to get out together. The problem is the Survive With Friends feature is very broken. As killer you feel like you are the survivor getting bullied by 4 killers at times if you go up against a toxic group of survivors. If you hook one of them and they die, even if you are across the map when the survivor dies in the endgame chat they will say that you camped them and they are all getting mad at you for no reason besides the fact that they lost. Thankfully this doesn't summarize the entire player base. A good part of the community is toxic though and it is sad to see. The developers aren't the best to be honest but they definitely aren't the worst.

The reason I am recommending this game is because of the game play. Playing as killer is very fun because having control of the map feels great and there is so much variety with all the different killers. Survivor is also fun, especially for your first games because it is terrifying to be chased by the killer. Sadly this novelty goes away the more you play the game. The survivors can usually dictate the pacing of the game though. This can be a problem for the killer and make the game boring for everyone sometimes. If the survivors gen rush the game can go faster than the queue times (for the killer at least, survivors have way shorter queue times). The thing is after all of these games you get points which brings you to the blood web.

The blood web is where you spend all of your blood points from the matches you play. This system is RNG on what perks you get and some are rarer than others. I personally love the whole blood web system, it keeps players hooked and makes you want to keep playing the game so you can get the perks you want. Sometimes it can be really frustrating though since it is RNG because if you spend 1,000,000 points and don't get the perks you want you feel like you just wasted your time. When you do get the perks you want though it feels very rewarding because you feel powerful in the next game. The only micro-transactions in this game are DLC characters with different perks and cosmetics. These DLC perks can be unlocked in the Shrine of Secrets where you spend shards which you get from leveling up. It isn't too hard to get the amount of shards you need for a perk but it can be a bit of a grind.

Overall I really like this game. I have been playing since release and I have definitely gotten my $20 out of this game.

I have mixed reviews on this game, if you play I recommend doing "Survive With Friends" you can coordinate better and have better odds of winning against the killer than playing Solo. You can still win being Solo but it all depends on who you are paired up with. Some of the killer's I've faced are extremly difficult to beat and its definitely a challenge to win. Where as other killers you get Troll/Campers and it takes away the fun from playing.

Dead By Daylight oyunu aslında gayet güzel , elverişli , yüksek sistem istemiyor.Arkadaşlarınız ile oynayabileceğiniz güzel şık bir oyun.Grafikleri olsun gayet başarılı.Korku oyunlarınıda seviyorsanız tam size göre bir oyun neden çünkü kovalayan yaratıkmı desem artık bazen aniden çıkıp korkutabiliyor.Oyun  kimine göre zor kimine göre kolaydır bazıları sever bazıları sevmez.Örneğin  ben oyunu beceremiyorum neden bilmiyorum o yüzden oyunu sevmedim ama aslında gayet güzel bir oyun.

Na sua essência, Dead by Daylight é simplesmente um jogo de esconde-esconde. Quatro se escondendo e um procurando. Em uma avaliação um pouco mais detalhada, eles criam uma experiência assimétrica, onde você tem um jogador (o caçador) contra os outros quatro jogadores (os sobreviventes). Estão atualizando constantemente o conteúdo.
